pages.text: Created using an $(blood)Alchemy Array$() by combining a $(l:animus:items/reagentheavelywrath)Reagent: Heavenly Wrath$() with a $(item)Demon Slate$(). The reagent must first be forged in the Hellfire Forge.

The Sigil of Heavenly Wrath channels the power of blood magic to smite enemies from above. When activated, all hostile entities within a 16-block radius are forcibly levitated into the air before being dropped to suffer crushing fall damage.
Right-click to activate the sigil. All enemies within 16 blocks (except the user) will be lifted into the air for 3 seconds before plummeting back down.$(br2)LP Cost: 1000 LP

pages.title: Advanced Mechanics
pages.text: When the levitation expires, entities are afflicted with the Heavy Heart effect (amplifier 4) for 2 seconds, preventing flying entities from using their flight ability to avoid fall damage.$(br2)Flying entities or those already high in the air receive enhanced downward velocity based on their height from the ground. For every 5 blocks of height, an additional -0.5 velocity is applied, making the sigil particularly effective against flying foes.$(br2)The base downward velocity is -1.5, with a maximum additional velocity of -3.0.
